name: FlaBeaver - Fly With Your Voice
description:
Have you ever dreamed of playing Flappy Bird with your voice?

Well, now you can... But it's a Beaver. Not a Bird. Beavers are cool.

Made for the 11th edition of the Creative Jam at the NAD

Made by:

Dimitri Arce - Design/Programming

Laurence David - Art/Animations

Raphael Huot - Design/Programming
